verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
This is the air I breathe
This is the air I breathe
Your holy presence
Living in me

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
This is my daily bread
This is my daily bread
Your very Word
Spoken to me

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And I, I'm desperate for You
And I, I'm lost without You
